info.name: 代龙泉
info.profile: Longquan Dai is an Associate Professor in Intelligent Media Analysis Group (IMAG) at School of Computer Science and Engineering, Nanjing University of Science and Technology (NJUST). He received his B.A., M.S. and Ph.D. degrees from Henan University of Technology (HAUT) in 2006, Shantou Univeristy (STU) in 2010 and National Laboratory of Pattern Recognition (NLPR), Institute of Automation, Chinese Academy of Sciences (CASIA) in 2016, respetively. Before jointing IMAG, he was a senior engineer of Huawei Technologies Co. Ltd. His Master and Doctoral supervisors are Prof. Minfen Shen who was the dean of the College of Engineering and Prof. Xiaopeng Zhang a member of Sina-European Laboratory of Informatics and Applied Mathematics (LIAMA).
info.profile_c: 2015年博士毕业于中科院自动化所模式识别国家重点实验室；研究方向为计算机视觉、机器学习；获得3项发明专利并在相关领域国际学术会议和国际期刊上发表文章 10 余篇，包括第一作者在TIP、TCSVT 等期刊和 ICCV、CVPR、NeurIPS等会议；是TIP、TNNSL、TCSVT、ICCV、ECCV、CVPR 等多个期刊和会议的审稿人。
